content: Jonas!! What an incredible and beautiful Easter sermon! Magnificent. What comes through is how much you genuinely love your flock (well we love you too.😊) And, as always, you are the master of setting aside ego. You are truly a “servant of the people.” No BS from you. Thank you for all your dedication…serious dedication. You are making a real difference in the lives of others. HAPPY EASTER, Jonas! …to your family too. Love, Emerald💚👗
